Description: Painted wooden squatting male figure wearing a short kilt; arms lost; head damaged; tenon in the base for attachment; part of a larger model group.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 235)
